pullRequest.title: Modified Admin REST APIs.

commit.message: Modified categories API and blocking condition REST API.

nodes.bodyText: Add context information to error messages (block condition type, value)
Add block condition context info so that someone can correlate the error messages with corresponding block condition.
Shall we add the override annotation to this method to indicate this method overrides the method declared in the APIAdmin.java interface?
Shall we add descriptions to the java doc comments?

nodes.bodyText:
Shall we add the override annotation here to indicate this method overrides the method declared in the APIProvider.java interface?
Shall we also remove the java docs comments since the comments are already available in the method declared in the APIProvider.java interface?
